QuestData.Title: Cleaning House
QuestData.Description: We are well on our way to returning the shrine to its former glory, $n. But there is some housecleaning to take care of. On the other side of this meadow, some ogre squatters are setting up camp, led by a thick-headed chunk of ugly by the name of Gar'gol.$B$BKill Gar'gol's minions and see if we can't send him packing.
QuestData.LogDescription: Kill any combination of 8 Hovel Brutes or Hovel Shadowcasters within Gar'gol's Hovel in Hyjal.
QuestData.RewardText: Hah! So you really sent some heads rolling, did you?$B$BIt was said during the War of the Ancients that Lo'Gosh fought demons for ten days solid. Hopefully you weren't fighting that long...
